body_html:
Same problem here... But, only with version 0.4.1:

pip3 install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.4.1-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl

With version 0.4.0 works fine:

pip3 install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.4.1-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl

So, probably a bug introduced in version 0.4.1.

body:
Same problem here... But, only with version `0.4.1`:
```
pip3 install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.4.1-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl
```

With version `0.4.0` works fine:
```
pip3 install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.4.1-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl
```
So, probably a bug introduced in version `0.4.1`.
